caption: Task Instructions
text:
You are asked to assess the truthfulness of 8 statements by means of 7 specific quality dimensions.

The task requires you to: 

  1. Fill up an initial demographic survey;
  2. Evaluate, one by one, 8 statements made by popular figures (for example, politicians). Each statement evaluation requires going through some steps
    • Read the statement carefully.
    • Use a search engine to search for evidence for the statement. Then, select the most relevant result.
    • Evaluate seven quality dimensions of the statement considering the evidence found.
    • The quality dimensions are: 
      • 1 - Completeness
      • 2 - Comprehensibility
      • 3 - Precision
      • 4 - Informativeness
      • 5 - Unbiasedness
      • 6 - Accuracy
      • 7 - Speaker's Trustworthiness
    • Evaluate the Overall truthfulness of the statement.
    • Express your level of confidence with such an overall assessment.

The statements are presented in random order. You can revise previous judgments at any moment. You might see many good statements, many bad ones, or any combination of them. There are quality checks throughout the task that need to be performed correctly to terminate the task and get paid. 

The data from this task is being gathered for research purposes only. Participation is entirely voluntary, and you are free to discontinue the task at any point.
